import { useState } from "react"; let INITIAL = { "balance":"" } function AddGoal({sendData}) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(INITIAL); const handleChange = evt => { const { name, value } = evt.target; setFormData(fData => ({ ...fData, [name]: value })); } function submitForm(event){ event.preventDefault() sendData(formData,params ) navigate.pushState("/user") } return (

Account

) } export default AddGoal;
